item.name: Auth
item.description: Authentication endpoints (login, refresh, logout, revoke tokens).

item.name: AccountTransactions
item.description: Endpoints to perform transactions on accounts (deposit, withdraw, transfer) and read balance.

item.name: Get Interest Logs By Account Id
Transactions
item.description: Operations to read transaction history and list transactions.

item.name: Create User
item.description: This endpoint creates a new user. The `role` and `bankId` fields are optional. If a role is not provided, the user will be assigned the default 'Client' role. If a bankId is not provided, the user will not be associated with any bank.

item.name: UserRoles
item.description: Endpoints to manage user roles assignment.
